andromeda.why: Refuses rushed commitments; preserves sovereignty before pledging continuity.

arcturus.why: Early viability check—scope, risk and durability before backing a venture.

draco.why: Loyalty pressure to ‘prove’ commitment regardless of viability.

lyra.why: This is survival calculus, not aesthetic narration.

orion-dark.why: Forcing continuity to maintain control rather than fitness.

orion-light.why: Discipline to wait and test—honorable trial of patience.

pleiades.why: Considers human cost so continuity serves the tribe.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching stewardship of commitment; no formal transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Declines coercion to ‘lock in’ before it’s correct.

arcturus.why: Places people/resources where durability increases—continuity engineering.

draco.why: Rank tests—prove loyalty to the plan over facts.

orion-dark.why: Protocol used to override honest viability signals.

orion-light.why: Quiet ordeal of restraint: commit only to what can endure.

pleiades.why: Attunes to relational impact so continuity is humane.

sirius.why: Practical navigation phase; not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Reclaims choice after bad bets or coercive loyalty binds.

arcturus.why: Regulation wobble—misreading what will last, then overcorrecting.

draco.why: Clinging for status/tribal face rather than true fitness.

lyra.why: Branding/optics used to mask failing viability.

orion-dark.why: Control scripts to preserve a faltering legacy.

orion-light.why: Ordeal: admit misreads, refine criteria, recommit cleanly.

pleiades.why: Appeasement loyalty—staying to avoid disappointing others.

sirius.why: Self-forging continuity sense; no pedagogy yet.

andromeda.why: Protects sovereignty from exploitative ‘stay for tradition’ demands.

arcturus.why: Translates sniff-test into protocol—criteria, checkpoints, pivot rules.

draco.why: Guards the tribe by selecting viable alliances and culling risks.

lyra.why: Narrates a sober legacy story that others can rally around.

orion-dark.why: Codifying ‘the one way’ to endure—orthodoxy risk.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-selection: model how to back what truly lasts.

pleiades.why: Ensures continuity does not sacrifice human wellbeing.

sirius.why: Continuity protocol—teaches viability standards others can apply.

andromeda.why: Resists propaganda to uphold dying legacies; keeps consent sovereign.

arcturus.why: Projected as universal fixer—burnout/scapegoat when refusing bad continuity.

draco.why: Loyalty tests—‘stand with the legacy’ over evidence.

lyra.why: Iconic stewardship presence that still points to substance.

orion-dark.why: Coercive heritage—obedience demanded in the name of tradition.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—support only what merits endurance.

pleiades.why: Appeasing stakeholders to keep peace, not truth.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: models ethical continuity under pressure.

andromeda.why: Frees communities from legacy capture—chooses meaning over inertia.

arcturus.why: Elder standards for durability—review cycles, sunset rules, stewardship.

draco.why: Guardian of what is worth preserving; filters threats to continuity.

orion-light.why: Elder ordeal: courage to end what cannot endure and back what can.

pleiades.why: Focus is standards of continuity, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Continuity sage—teaches the law of what endures by embodied example.
